snippet: The former Yankee Chien-Ming Wang, now with Washington, injured his hamstring covering first base on a ground ball by Russell Martin.
abstract: Washington Nationals pitcher Chien-Ming Wang injures his hamstring in spring training game against New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: The former Yankee Chien-Ming Wang, now with Washington, injured his hamstring covering first base on a ground ball by Russell Martin.

headline.seo: Chien-Ming Wang Hurt in Game Against Yankees
headline.main: Wang Injured in Game Against Yankees
headline.print_headline: Wang Injured in Game Against Yankees
